description: Nim is a quite unique programming language that focusses on meta programming by giving you one of the most powerful macro systems. In this talk we will look at how Nim's macro system gives us a high performance asynchronous IO framework. In other words what is usually built into a language core can be an ordinary library extension in Nim.

title: Nim async voodoo
